h2. Specifications
* Cooking Capacity: 101 oz (3 L) of liquid * Dry Weight: 14.5 lbs (6.6 kg) * Unit Size: Length: 24.2” (61.5 cm), Height: 8.5” (21.6 cm), Width: 8.2” (20.8 cm) * Estimated Cooking Power: [Sun] 200+ Watts in full sunlight, [Electric] 144W nominal @12Vdc. * Maximum Temperature: 550°F (288°C) * Working Temperature: 200°F (93°C) - 400°F (232°C)
h2. Sources
CZ ⛔ [https://solarnivaric.cz/produkty/gosun-fusion-hybrid-powerbank/|https://solarnivaric.cz/produkty/gosun-fusion-hybrid-powerbank/] (~ 900 € package / ~ 700 € single)
*ES* (/) [*https://www.ecovidasolar.es/hornos-solares/1640-horno-solar-gosun-fusion.html*|https://www.ecovidasolar.es/hornos-solares/1640-horno-solar-gosun-fusion.html] *(550 €)*
CH (/) [https://www.red-dolphin.ch/en/greentech/162-gosun-fusion-856563005316.html|https://www.red-dolphin.ch/en/greentech/162-gosun-fusion-856563005316.html] (~ 550 €)

h2. Specifications
* Cooking Capacity: 101 oz (3 L) of liquid * Dry Weight: 14.5 lbs (6.6 kg) * Unit Size: Length: 24.2” (61.5 cm), Height: 8.5” (21.6 cm), Width: 8.2” (20.8 cm) * Estimated Cooking Power: [Sun] 200+ Watts in full sunlight, [Electric] 144W nominal @12Vdc. * Maximum Temperature: 550°F (288°C) * Working Temperature: 200°F (93°C) - 400°F (232°C)
h2. Sources
CZ ⛔ [https://solarnivaric.cz/produkty/gosun-fusion-hybrid-powerbank/|https://solarnivaric.cz/produkty/gosun-fusion-hybrid-powerbank/] (~ 900 € package / ~ 700 € single)

CH (/) [https://www.red-dolphin.ch/en/greentech/162-gosun-fusion-856563005316.html|https://www.red-dolphin.ch/en/greentech/162-gosun-fusion-856563005316.html] (~ 550 €)

nominal voltage = 12, actual voltage much higher so that a charge controller can supply 12 V and charge a 12-V-battery at 14 or 15 V → current will always be less than 10 A

Use Cases
* backup for [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/BOGOI-843|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/BOGOI-843|smart-link] * physical distribution / concentration of 36-V-panels * handle 72 V panels even for 12 V bus ( [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-133|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-133|smart-link] and [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-297|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-297|smart-link] are too limited in input voltage) * to control 12 V loads when 12 V backbone is fully charged

* backup for [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/BOGOI-843|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/BOGOI-843|smart-link] * physical distribution / concentration of 36-V-panels * handle 72 V panels even for 12 V bus ( [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-133|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-133|smart-link] and [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-297|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-297|smart-link] are too limited in input voltage) * to control 12 V loads when 12 V backbone is fully charged

charging from other sources seems to work but can result in errors like [https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-264|https://knowhere.atlassian.net/browse/MARU-264|smart-link]

E40/E80/E175 Battery Type of battery Lithium iron phosphate battery Nominal capacity 40Ah(E40) / *80Ah*(E80) / 175Ah(E175) *Rated voltage 51.2V* Rated power 2048Wh(E40) / *4096Wh*(E80) / 8960Wh(E175) *Charging voltage 57.6V* Discharging cut-off voltage 41.6V Maximum charging current 20A(E40) / *40A*(E80) / 80A(E175) Maximum continuous discharging current 40A(E40) / *80A*(E80) / 150A(E175) Parallel connection Max 16 E-Series Batteries Series connection Not support Storage temperature -20~60°C Charging temperature 0~55°C Discharging temperature -10~55°C Dimensions (w handle) 420 x _390 x_ 207mm(E40) / *555 x* *_440 x_* *212mm*(E80) / 500 x _565 x_ 277mm(E175) Weight 29kg(E40) / *49kg*(E80) / 87kg(E175) Ingress protection rating IP67 Recommended battery level during storage 45%~50%

E40/E80/E175 Battery Type of battery Lithium iron phosphate battery Nominal capacity 40Ah(E40) / *80Ah*(E80) / 175Ah(E175) *Rated voltage 51.2V* Rated power 2048Wh(E40) / *4096Wh*(E80) / 8960Wh(E175) *Charging voltage 57.6V* Discharging cut-off voltage 41.6V Maximum charging current 20A(E40) / *40A*(E80) / 80A(E175) Maximum continuous discharging current 40A(E40) / *80A*(E80) / 150A(E175) Parallel connection Max 16 E-Series Batteries Series connection Not support Storage temperature -20~60°C Charging temperature 0~55°C Discharging temperature -10~55°C Dimensions (w handle) 420 x _390 x_ 207mm(E40) / *555 x* *_440 x_* *212mm*(E80) / 500 x _565 x_ 277mm(E175) Weight 29kg(E40) / *49kg*(E80) / 87kg(E175) Ingress protection rating IP67 Recommended battery level during storage 45%~50%

Fock
area = 7 m²

Fock
area = 7 m²
Jib Sail → ist gebündelt in ◇ → + → aggregiert ◇ ↩

... area, wind force & center of effort
In standard Kutter Rig, the typical total sail area is 11 + 10 + 7 = 28 m²
In stronger wind less sail area is used. For light wind from behind, Spinnaker or Gennaker (Blister) can be used in stead of Genoa to increase the total sail area significantly.

... area, wind force & center of effort
In standard Kutter Rig, the typical total sail area is 11 + 10 + 7 = 28 m²
In stronger wind less sail area is used. For light wind from behind, Spinnaker or Gennaker (Blister) can be used in stead of Genoa to increase the total sail area significantly.

NAVY 6.0-S/L Type Electric Rated Voltage / Current 48 V / 125 A Input Voltage Range 39 V ~ 60 V DC Maximum Input Power (Forward / Reverse) 6 kW / 4 kW Comparable Petrol Outboard 9.9 hp Maximum Overall Efficiency 57% Maximum Rotation Speed (Forward) 1550 rpm Control System Remote / Tiller Communication Wireless / Wired Communication Distance ≤10m
h2. Dimension (L x W x H)
413 x 308 x 1200 (mm)
Shaft Length 765 mm
Weight 28.4 kg
Trim Angle Manual 4-step: 0°, 5°, 10°, 15° Tilt Angle Manual: 60° Gear Oil Capacity 285 ml Recommended Gear Oil API GL-4 SAE 90 Coolant Capacity 630 ml Recommended Coolant ANT High-pitch Propeller (Diameter / Pitch) 320 mm (12.6") / 10.8" Low-pitch Propeller (Diameter / Pitch) 340 mm (13.4") / 8.5" Operating Ambient Temperature -25°C ~ 50°C (-13°F ~ 122°F)
